#2A #selfdefense

I’m proud to see California passed a law raising the age to purchase rifles and shotguns to 21. Senator @JeffFlake and I have a similar bill that would do this nationally. It’s a commonsense measure that will help keep us safe.

My heart is with loved ones of victims and those injured in the horrific shooting in Las Vegas one year ago today, but thoughts and prayers will never be enough. To honor them, we must demand change. We must vote out every elected leader who won’t stand up to the NRA.

A year ago, today, one gunman shot 471 people in Las Vegas. 58 died. No meaningful changes have been made to federal gun laws. The DoJ’s proposed ‘bump stock’ ban is moving at a snail’s pace. You can still legally buy a semi-auto assault weapon & make it fire like a machine gun.
